verses.verse: And when the people <S%H5971><s%> complained, <S%H596><s%> it displeased <S%H7451><s%> <S%H241><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it; and his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled; <S%H2734><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> burnt <S%H1197><s%> among them, and consumed <S%H398><s%> them that were in the uttermost parts <S%H7097><s%> of the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and when Moses <S%H4872><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> was quenched. <S%H8257><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Taberah: <S%H8404><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> burnt <S%H1197><s%> among them.

And the mixed multitude <S%H628><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was among <S%H7130><s%> them fell a lusting: <S%H183><s%> <S%H8378><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat? <S%H398><s%>

We remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fish, <S%H1710><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we did eat <S%H398><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> freely; <S%H2600><s%> <S%H853><s%> the cucumbers, <S%H7180><s%> and the melons, <S%H20><s%> and the leeks, <S%H2682><s%> and the onions, <S%H1211><s%> and the garlic: <S%H7762><s%>

But now <S%H6258><s%> our soul <S%H5315><s%> is dried away: <S%H3002><s%> there is nothing <S%H369><s%> at all, <S%H3605><s%> beside <S%H1115><s%> <S%H413><s%> this manna, <S%H4478><s%> before our eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
And the manna <S%H4478><s%> was as coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> and the color <S%H5869><s%> thereof as the color <S%H5869><s%> of bedellium. <S%H916><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> went about, <S%H7751><s%> and gathered <S%H3950><s%> it, and ground <S%H2912><s%> it in mills, <S%H7347><s%> or <S%H176><s%> beat <S%H1743><s%> it in a mortar, <S%H4085><s%> and baked <S%H1310><s%> it in pans, <S%H6517><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%> of it: and the taste <S%H2940><s%> of it was <S%H1961><s%> as the taste <S%H2940><s%> of fresh <S%H3955><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>
And when the dew <S%H2919><s%> fell <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> the manna <S%H4478><s%> fell <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> weep <S%H1058><s%> throughout their families, <S%H4940><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of his tent: <S%H168><s%> and the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> also was displeased. <S%H5869><s%> <S%H7451><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> hast thou afflicted <S%H7489><s%> thy servant? <S%H5650><s%> and wherefore <S%H4100><s%> have I not <S%H3808><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> that thou layest <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the burden <S%H4853><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me?

Have I <S%H595><s%> conceived <S%H2030><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people? <S%H5971><s%> have I <S%H595><s%> begotten <S%H3205><s%> them, that <S%H3588><s%> thou shouldest say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Carry <S%H5375><s%> them in thy bosom, <S%H2436><s%> as <S%H834><s%> a nursing father <S%H539><s%> beareth <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sucking child, <S%H3243><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou sworest <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers? <S%H1><s%>

Whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> should I have flesh <S%H1320><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people? <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they weep <S%H1058><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> us flesh, <S%H1320><s%> that we may eat. <S%H398><s%>

I <S%H595><s%> am not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it is too heavy <S%H3515><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> me.

And if <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> deal <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H3602><s%> with me, kill <S%H2026><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> out of hand, <S%H2026><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight; <S%H5869><s%> and let me not <S%H408><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> my wretchedness. <S%H7451><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Gather <S%H622><s%> unto me seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> to be the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> over them; and bring <S%H3947><s%> them unto <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> that they may stand <S%H3320><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

And I will come down <S%H3381><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee there: <S%H8033><s%> and I will take <S%H680><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and will put <S%H7760><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> them; and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, that thou <S%H859><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> it not <S%H3808><s%> thyself alone. <S%H905><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> thou unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> Sanctify yourselves <S%H6942><s%> against tomorrow, <S%H4279><s%> and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> flesh: <S%H1320><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye have wept <S%H1058><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall give us flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat? <S%H398><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it was well <S%H2895><s%> with us in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and ye shall eat. <S%H398><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> one <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> two days, <S%H3117><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

But even <S%H5704><s%> a whole <S%H3117><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> it come out <S%H3318><s%> at your nostrils, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H639><s%> and it be <S%H1961><s%> loathsome <S%H2214><s%> unto you: because <S%H3282><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye have despised <S%H3988><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, and have wept <S%H1058><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> <S%H2088><s%> came we forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> The people, <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am, are six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> footmen; <S%H7273><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> hast said, <S%H559><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> them flesh, <S%H1320><s%> that they may eat <S%H398><s%> a whole <S%H3117><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

Shall the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and the herds <S%H1241><s%> be slain <S%H7819><s%> for them, to suffice <S%H4672><s%> them? or <S%H518><s%> <S%H853><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> be gathered together <S%H622><s%> for them, to suffice <S%H4672><s%> them?

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Is the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> waxed short? <S%H7114><s%> thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> whether my word <S%H1697><s%> shall come to pass <S%H7136><s%> unto thee or <S%H518><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and gathered <S%H622><s%> the seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> them round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> in a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and took <S%H680><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and gave <S%H5414><s%> it unto <S%H5921><s%> the seventy <S%H7657><s%> elders: <S%H376><s%> <S%H2205><s%> and it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that, when the spirit <S%H7307><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, they prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> and did not <S%H3808><s%> cease. <S%H3254><s%>

But there remained <S%H7604><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Eldad, <S%H419><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Medad: <S%H4312><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them; and they <S%H1992><s%> were of them that were written, <S%H3789><s%> but went not out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H3808><s%> unto the tabernacle: <S%H168><s%> and they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And there ran <S%H7323><s%> a young man, <S%H5288><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Eldad <S%H419><s%> and Medad <S%H4312><s%> do prophesy <S%H5012><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H8334><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> one of his young men, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H979><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> My lord <S%H113><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> forbid <S%H3607><s%> them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Enviest <S%H7065><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> for my sake? would God <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> were prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> would put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them!
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> got <S%H622><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And there went forth <S%H5265><s%> a wind <S%H7307><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and brought <S%H1468><s%> quails <S%H7958><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and let them fall <S%H5203><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> as it were a day's <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> on this side, <S%H3541><s%> and as it were a day's <S%H3117><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> on the other side, <S%H3541><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and as it were two cubits <S%H520><s%> high upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> stood up <S%H6965><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that night, <S%H3915><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the next <S%H4283><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and they gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> the quails: <S%H7958><s%> he that gathered least <S%H4591><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> homers: <S%H2563><s%> and they spread them all abroad <S%H7849><s%> <S%H7849><s%> for themselves round about <S%H5439><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And while the flesh <S%H1320><s%> was yet <S%H5750><s%> between <S%H996><s%> their teeth, <S%H8127><s%> ere <S%H2962><s%> it was chewed, <S%H3772><s%> the wrath <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the people, <S%H5971><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> plague. <S%H4347><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> Kibroth-hattaavah: <S%H6914><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> they buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that lusted. <S%H183><s%>
And the people <S%H5971><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kibroth-hattaavah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6914><s%> unto Hazeroth; <S%H2698><s%> and abode <S%H1961><s%> at Hazeroth. <S%H2698><s%>
